verses.esv:
7   You are altogether beautiful, my love;
    there is no flaw in you.
verses.kjv: 7 Thou art all fair, my love; there is no spot in thee.
verses.niv: 7 All beautiful you are, my darling; there is no flaw in you.

verses.esv:
14   I praise you, for I am fearfully and wonderfully made.
  Wonderful are your works;
    my soul knows it very well.
verses.kjv: 14 I will praise thee; for I am fearfully and wonderfully made: marvellous are thy works; and that my soul knoweth right well.
verses.niv: 14 I praise you because I am fearfully and wonderfully made; your works are wonderful, I know that full well.

verses.esv:
13   The fig tree ripens its figs,
    and the vines are in blossom;
    they give forth fragrance.
  Arise, my love, my beautiful one,
    and come away.
verses.kjv: 13 The fig tree putteth forth her green figs, and the vines with the tender grape give a good smell. Arise, my love, my fair one, and come away.
verses.niv: 13 The fig tree forms its early fruit; the blossoming vines spread their fragrance. Arise, come, my darling; my beautiful one, come with me."

verses.esv:
4   You shall no more be termed Forsaken,
    and your land shall no more be termed Desolate,
  but you shall be called My Delight Is in Her,
    and your land Married;
  for the LORD delights in you,
    and your land shall be married.
verses.kjv: 4 Thou shalt no more be termed Forsaken; neither shall thy land any more be termed Desolate: but thou shalt be called Hephzi-bah, and thy land Beulah: for the LORD delighteth in thee, and thy land shall be married.
verses.niv: 4 No longer will they call you Deserted, or name your land Desolate. But you will be called Hephzibah, and your land Beulah; for the LORD will take delight in you, and your land will be married.

verses.esv: 11 He has made everything beautiful in its time. Also, he has put eternity into man’s heart, yet so that he cannot find out what God has done from the beginning to the end.
verses.kjv: 11 He hath made every thing beautiful in his time: also he hath set the world in their heart, so that no man can find out the work that God maketh from the beginning to the end.
verses.niv: 11 He has made everything beautiful in its time. He has also set eternity in the hearts of men; yet they cannot fathom what God has done from beginning to end.

verses.esv: 31 And God saw everything that he had made, and behold, it was very good. And there was evening and there was morning, the sixth day.
verses.kjv: 31 And God saw every thing that he had made, and, behold, it was very good. And the evening and the morning were the sixth day.
verses.niv: 31 God saw all that he had made, and it was very good. And there was evening, and there was morning-the sixth day.

verses.esv:
10   My beloved speaks and says to me:
  “Arise, my love, my beautiful one,
    and come away,
verses.kjv: 10 My beloved spake, and said unto me, Rise up, my love, my fair one, and come away.
verses.niv: 10 My lover spoke and said to me, "Arise, my darling, my beautiful one, and come with me.

verses.esv:
10    An excellent wife who can find?
    She is far more precious than jewels.
verses.kjv: 10 Who can find a virtuous woman? for her price is far above rubies.
verses.niv: 10 A wife of noble character who can find? She is worth far more than rubies.
